text:
A landmark year. A promising tomorrow.
In FY 2024-25, we delivered record revenue and profit, driven by our vision: Be the Future of Mobility.
From purpose to performance, uncover the year that’s powering the Hero story. 
https://t.co/CpzzCt7YOQ

#AnnualReport #HeroMotoCorp https://t.co/VQMsY4r0G8

Hero MotoCorp has posted its highest-ever revenue and profit in FY 2024–25. We've retained market leadership for the 24th consecutive year, closing FY25 at the top. With nearly 5.9 million two-wheelers sold, consolidated revenue stood at ₹40,923 crore and net profit rose by 17% year-on-year.

#Results #HeroMotoCorp

56 teams from 53,945 participants? What a journey!
Results of the Idea Elevator Pitch Submission round of Hero Campus Challenge Season 7 are out! We now have our 30 teams each from B-School and E-School tracks who’ll move further in the competition.
 #heromotocorp #hccseason7 https://t.co/gN6d5NX8RD

To mark #ZeroEmissionsDay, we're here to finally reveal the results of our @GWR title for the 'Largest online photo album of people planting plants’ on 21st September 2021.  We thank you for all your continued support.
#100MillionHereos #HeroGreenDrive #GuinnessWorldRecords https://t.co/FnfYA3q5GD

Fruits of patience are always sweet! And a little more will bring to you the results for HeroCoLabs Global Design Challenge. Stay tuned for the final results, which will be declared on April 6, 2021; Tuesday

Follow us on social media to tune in or visit https://t.co/b51nvbBUSZ https://t.co/29KUMuW5fu

The submissions have been recorded. Over to the jury members now! 
We will announce the results soon.
Till then wishing you all a very Happy New Year!
#herocolabs https://t.co/4O8CQFnHUb

We finish the registration phase of #HeroCoLabs - The App Challenge with a whopping 4,000+ registrations. 
Thank you to everyone who participated.
Sit tight as we share the results for this Round soon!
